attributes.action: I would like Scotland to bring back the Scottish one pound note
attributes.background: Why have we lost the one pound note in Scotland. I and millions of other have grown up with the wee green note and i would like the Scottish one pound note back in circulation. Its part of Scotland and is always been associated with Scotland over quite alot of years and should not have been removed.

rejection.details: The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can get in contact with them  for advice at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
